contents.text: Thank you for calling Nova Credit in San Francisco, where we unlock international credit data to help lenders make better decisions.
For new partnership and sales inquiries, press 1.
For consumer loan data solutions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for consumer loan data solutions.

navigationGoals: I need pricing details and a setup timeline for your consumer loan data solution.
Learn how to use Nova Credit’s consumer loan data solution to bring my overseas credit history into a US personal loan application as a veteran
Discuss licensing and pricing for the consumer loan data API with a sales rep
I’d like pricing details for your consumer loan data solution
I’m interested in a detailed overview of your consumer loan data solution’s pricing structure and data coverage.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to our Enterprise Integration team.

navigationGoals: I’d like to discuss next steps for integrating Nova Credit data into our enterprise systems.
Discuss enterprise integration options to embed Nova Credit’s international credit data into my veteran support organization’s platform
Explore enterprise integration options and API onboarding process
I want to explore integrating Nova Credit data into our bank’s system
I’d like to explore the technical requirements and SLAs for integrating your international credit data into our enterprise platform.

contents.text: For account and reporting support, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our Client Success team for account and reporting support.

navigationGoals: I need help accessing my account reports and understanding my usage dashboard.
Get assistance updating my existing client account and understanding my monthly credit reporting dashboard
Troubleshoot discrepancies in my credit reporting dashboard data
I need help understanding my account reports
I need assistance exporting and interpreting my account and reporting data from my Nova Credit client portal.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to Technical Support for API and integration assistance.

navigationGoals: I need technical support to resolve API integration issues.
Troubleshoot an API integration error with Nova Credit’s technical support for our credit data feed
Get assistance resolving API authentication and integration errors
I need technical support for the API integration
I’m encountering errors with the credit-data API and need technical support to resolve authentication and endpoint issues.
